casebody.data:
PERRY
v.
BRITT 225P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Adam L. Perry, for Perry, Adam L.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of July 2017 by Plaintiff for Application for Preliminary and/or Permanent Injunction:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
